name: Block Dungeon
description:
Block Dungeon is a sandbox-style roguelike game.
You have to go through dungeons full of unique enemies and bonuses.
Collect sets of armor and weapons, defeat enemies who become
stronger and stronger each time. Random level generation and constant
pumping your character.

- More than 30 types of weapons and uniforms.
- 3 unique biomes.
- Several types of enemies for each biome.
- Nice graphics and smooth gameplay.
